item.title: Making HP start at 10/10 and not 10/99
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

I need to keep HP at 10/10 so I can make it level up like other levels. I’m using a Phonescape source.

When I set this:

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = 14000000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

to:

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1050; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

I still get 10/99, even if my XP is off a little.

Can anyone help me out?

Read full topic
item.source: Making HP start at 10/10 and not 10/99
